title: A ranked list of awesome Scala libraries
content: "Best-of-Scala" is a curated list of 370 open-source Scala projects, updated weekly. These projects are grouped into 21 categories and ranked using a project-quality score, which is calculated based on various metrics collected from GitHub and package managers. The list includes projects like "awesome-scala", "cats", and "akka-http". Developers can contribute to the list by opening issues, submitting pull requests, or editing the projects.yaml file directly. The list is a valuable resource for Scala developers looking for high-quality libraries and tools. Check out "Best-of-Scala" to discover other best-of lists or create your own.
